name: agent_generated_chat_to_rag_agent_creator
description: Conversational interface for creating RAG-based AI agents with automatic configuration, knowledge base setup, and seamless TrustStream integration. Guides users through requirements gathering, template selection, knowledge base creation, agent generation, and deployment.
description_for_agent: MCP server that provides a conversational interface for creating RAG agents. Includes tools for conversation management, requirements analysis, knowledge base creation, agent generation, cost estimation, and TrustStream deployment integration.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for embeddings and language model operations

SUPABASE_URL.description: Supabase URL for TrustStream backend integration

SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY.description: Supabase service role key for database operations

TRUSTSTREAM_BACKEND_URL.description: TrustStream backend URL for enhanced integration features

BASE_RAG_COST.description: Base cost for RAG operations in ooumph coins (default: 0.01)

EMBEDDING_COST_PER_TOKEN.description: Cost per token for embedding generation (default: 0.0001)
